question: The youngest Mayor of the country was sworn in in which Indian state?
explanation:
A 21-year-old CPI(M) leader Arya Rajendran was recently sworn-in as the youngest mayor of Thiruvananthapuram Corporation.
The Corporation is the largest urban body in the state of Kerala. Arya Rajendran, who is pursuing her graduate course, began her political journey as a child activist in Balasangam, the childrenâ€™s organisation affiliated to the CPI-M party.
